allproducts.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
allproducts.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a flagship smartphone with a stunning 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a powerful Snapdragon 888 processor, and a versatile quad-camera setup.

allproducts.name: Apple MacBook Pro (2021)
allproducts.description: The Apple MacBook Pro (2021) is a powerful laptop featuring Apple's M1 Pro or M1 Max chip, a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 64GB of unified memory.

allproducts.name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
allproducts.description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 is a top-of-the-line wireless headphone with industry-leading noise cancellation, high-quality sound, and long battery life.

allproducts.name: Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Camera
allproducts.description: The Canon EOS R5 is a professional-grade mirrorless camera with a high-resolution sensor, advanced autofocus system, and 8K video recording capabilities.

allproducts.name: Dyson V11 Torque Drive Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
allproducts.description: The Dyson V11 Torque Drive is a powerful cordless vacuum cleaner with intelligent suction, a high-torque cleaner head, and up to 60 minutes of runtime.

allproducts.name: LG CX OLED 4K TV
allproducts.description: The LG CX OLED 4K TV offers stunning picture quality with perfect black levels, vibrant colors, and Dolby Vision support. It also features HDMI 2.1 ports for gaming.

allproducts.name: Nintendo Switch Console
allproducts.description: The Nintendo Switch is a versatile gaming console that can be used as a handheld device or connected to a TV. It offers a wide range of games for all ages.

allproducts.name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Headphones
allproducts.description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II is a popular choice for wireless headphones with excellent noise cancellation, comfortable fit, and impressive sound quality.

allproducts.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
allproducts.description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 is a sleek and powerful laptop with a choice of Intel or AMD processors, a high-resolution PixelSense touchscreen, and all-day battery life.

allproducts.name: GoPro HERO10 Black
allproducts.description: The GoPro HERO10 Black is a versatile action camera with stunning 5.3K video recording, improved low-light performance, and advanced stabilization.
